import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function LoginForm(){const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('password123');// Default password for simplicity
const handleLogin=()=>{axios.post('http://localhost:3000/api/auth/login',{username,password}).then(res=>{localStorage.setItem('userId',res.data.userId);localStorage.setItem("username",res.data.username);alert("Login success!");}).catch(err=>{alert("Login failed");console.error(err);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Username",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogin,children:"Login"})]});}export default LoginForm;
